## About Deckset

Deckset revolutionizes presentation creation by separating content from design, allowing users to focus on their message while the application handles the visual presentation. This innovative approach enables presenters to write their content using simple Markdown syntaxâ€”a straightforward text format that eliminates the complexity of traditional presentation software. By concentrating on the narrative first and design second, Deckset empowers users to create more compelling, content-driven presentations that maintain visual consistency and professional appeal without requiring design expertise or time-consuming formatting adjustments.

The application stands out through its sophisticated rendering engine that interprets Markdown elements as presentation components, transforming headings into slide titles, bullet points into animated lists, and code snippets into syntax-highlighted examples. Deckset's carefully curated template collection, developed by professional designers, ensures that every presentation maintains high visual standards with perfect typography, balanced layouts, and appropriate color schemes. This focus on content-first creation makes Deckset particularly valuable for developers, educators, and professionals who frequently present technical information or need to create polished presentations quickly without sacrificing visual quality or design integrity.

## Deckset Advantages

ğŸ”¹ **Markdown-Powered Workflow** - Simple text formatting that converts to beautiful slides automatically

ğŸ”¹ **Designer-Curated Templates** - Professional themes with perfect typography and layout principles

ğŸ”¹ **Live Preview Capability** - Instant visual feedback as you type with real-time rendering

ğŸ”¹ **Export Flexibility** - Multiple output formats including PDF, HTML, and video recordings

---

## âš™ï¸ System Requirements

### Desktop Platform Compatibility
- **Supported Systems**: Modern desktop operating systems
- **Processor**: Multi-core processor for smooth rendering
- **Memory**: 4GB RAM minimum, 8GB recommended
- **Storage**: 500MB available space for application and templates
- **Display**: 1280x800 resolution or higher for optimal viewing

### File Format Support
- **Input**: Markdown (.md), Text files (.txt)
- **Output**: PDF documents, HTML presentations, Video recordings
- **Media**: JPEG, PNG, SVG images with automatic scaling and positioning
